author: Gino D'Acampo
method: Rub the steak with the Cajun spice and drizzle with oil. Heat a frying pan until smoking hot, add the steak and sear on all sides for 2-3 minutes. Add the garlic and fry for one minute. Remove from the heat and leave to rest for five minutes. Slice thinly. To serve, pile the herbs onto a serving plate. Top with the sliced steak and drizzle with balsamic vinegar, lime juice and a dash of olive oil.
ingredients: 300g/12oz T-bone steak, bone removed,  1 tsp Cajun spice seasoning,  1 tbsp olive oil, plus extra for drizzling,  2 garlic cloves, finely chopped,  small handful each fresh chervil, basil and parsley,  2 tsp balsamic vinegar,  squeeze lime juice
